00044 class MAMDAOPTExpDLL MamdaOrderBookException : public invalid_argument
00045 {
00046 public:
00047     MamdaOrderBookException (const string& msg)

00049         {}
00050     virtual ~MamdaOrderBookException() throw () {}

00060 class MAMDAOPTExpDLL MamdaOrderBookDuplicateEntry : public MamdaOrderBookException
00061 {
00062 public:
00063     MamdaOrderBookDuplicateEntry (MamdaOrderBookEntry*  origEntry,
00064                                   MamdaOrderBookEntry*  dupEntry)
00065         : MamdaOrderBookException ("duplicate entry ID")
00066         , mOrigEntry (origEntry)
00067         , mDupEntry  (dupEntry)
00068         {}
00069     MamdaOrderBookEntry*  getOrigEntry() { return mOrigEntry; }
00070     MamdaOrderBookEntry*  getDupEntry()  { return mDupEntry;  }
00071 
00072 private:
00073     MamdaOrderBookEntry*  mOrigEntry;
00074     MamdaOrderBookEntry*  mDupEntry;
00075 };

00083 class MAMDAOPTExpDLL MamdaOrderBookMissingEntry : public MamdaOrderBookException
00084 {
00085 public:
00086     MamdaOrderBookMissingEntry (const string&  missingEntryId)
00087         : MamdaOrderBookException ("missing entry ID")
00088         , mMissingId (missingEntryId)
00089         {}
00090     virtual ~MamdaOrderBookMissingEntry() throw () {}
00091     const char*  getMissingEntryId() { return mMissingId.c_str(); }
00092 
00093 private:
00094     string mMissingId;
00095 };

00104 class MAMDAOPTExpDLL MamdaOrderBookInvalidEntry : public MamdaOrderBookException
00105 {

00108                                 const string&               msg)
